calm
Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 88 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
inevitable let's find out what it means
and how you can use it in your daily
conversation inevitable there are
certain events that take place in your
life for which you have no control over
them the word inevitable basically means
something that is impossible to avoid or
you just can't prevent them from
happening an event that is unavoidable
and certain to take place is inevitable
you can't stop it from taking place as
you have no control over it and can't do
anything about it for example if you are
an avid biker and ride at a very high
speed
an accident at some point of time is
inevitable the accident is bound to
happen due to your careless riding
inevitable also means something that
keeps occurring or appearing
the word inevitable can be used as an
adjective or a noun
depending on how it is used in a
sentence the word inevitably is an
adverb as it shows that something that
happens unavoidably and certainly okay
now that you know what inevitable means
let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example one it
was inevitable that James would be fired
from his job because he always came late
and left very early example to a
sedentary lifestyle and know exercising
followed by an unhealthy diet leads to
inevitable weight gain and obesity
example 3 Lisbon told his wife we must
inevitably make some sacrifices if we
want to save money for our child's
future example for the professor told
all the new entrants learn joyfully and
peacefully knowing that positive
thoughts and efforts inevitably bring
the best results example 5 the
basketball team suffered an inevitable
loss given the fact that the majority of
their players were injured example 6
suffering from joint pains and
developing wrinkles are an inevitable
part of ageing in humans
example seven getting wet in the heavy
rains is inevitable even though you
carry an umbrella example eight with the
kind of reckless spending it was
inevitable for Ricky to be bankrupt
example 9 / falling asleep during the
day is inevitable after the long night
but Jennifer spent soothing her unwell
baby
example 10 with the rise in the fuel
price the rise in the prices of other
commodities is inevitable example 11
after the collision of the trains the
delay of other trains was inevitable
leaving all the commuters anxious and
tired at the platform example 12 with
the adaptation of the Western culture
live-in relationships are inevitable in
most of the countries that's the end of
today's episode have you ever faced an
inevitable event and how did you handle
it kindly share your experiences in the
comment box below this video thank you
for watching us do watch all the
